description:
Komatsu must find an exquisite sauce to top a dish of very rare fish, and Toriko prepares to venture deep into the deadly Wu Jungle in search of food fit for a Battle Wolf!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: DNA ni Kizama Reta Aji! Toriko, BB (Blue Blood) Koun o Sagase!
DNAに刻まれた味! トリコ, BB(ブルーブラッド)コーンを探せ!
The Taste Written in His DNA! Toriko, Search for the BB Corn!
